paper_abstract: We establish central and local limit theorems for the number of vertices in the largest component of a random d-uniform hypergraph H(d)(n, p) with edge probability p = c/(n-1 d-1), where c > (d-1)(-1) is a constant. The proof relies on a new, purely, probabilistic approach. (C) 2000 Wiley Periodicals, Inc. Random Struct. Alg., 36, 149-184, 2010
paper_title: The Order of the Giant Component of Random Hypergraphs
